contest-event.event-date:
April 9, 1972 D NWABBA Contest (Third Section)
NWABBA Contest (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest NWABBA Contest nwabba-contest-third-section
Own Choice from a Specified List
Pembroke Halls, Worsley, Lancashire Prizes - 1st 30 and rose bowl, 2nd £20 and trophy, 3rd £15 and shield, 4th £5 and cup. Choice of Nott'num Town or Three Brass Band Studies. 10 bands competed.
May 21, 2015, 10:15 a.m. May 21, 2015, 10:22 a.m.
1 Storeys of Lancaster Band J. D. Robinson
2 North Ashton Prize Les Naylor
3 Radcliffe Brass Band C. A. Randall
4 Greenalls Band Charles Fradley
Unknown Result Christ Church (Bradford) Silver Ernie Wedgewood
Unknown Result Flimby Saxhorn R. Martin
Unknown Result Parr (St. Helens) Band Bob Kerwick
Unknown Result Port Sunlight Royal British Legion H. G. Mather
Unknown Result Thornsett Brian Taylor
Unknown Result Wigan & District Edward Gray
